a North American plant in the mint family with brightly coloured flowers: Butterflies and bees hover over the flower heads when horsemint is in bloom. Native Americans used horsemint for a variety of medical ailments. Synonyms
bee balm
monarda
wild bergamot
a wild European plant in the mint family, with pale purple flowers : Horsemint, lilies, and other water-loving plants were all killed by the heat and drought.
More examplesFewer examplesHorsemint leaves grow opposite each other, gracefully bending downward.Horsemint is a prolific member of the mint family with a range from the American Southwest to Canada, including Montana.
